text: Samantha Bee was born in Toronto, Ontario, and discovered her passion for performing while at the University of Ottawa before joining The Daily Show With Jon Stewart in 2003 and then launching her own talk show in 2016. She became a dual citizen of Canada and the U. S. in 2014 — along with her husband, Jason Jones — and voted in her first election in November 2016. Bee has been very vocal in speaking out against Trump and his travel ban.
